cab.content: SECRET.G,T. 1298. THE FORTHCOMING INTER-ALLIED CONFERENCE. (Note by the Secretary.) I am asked "by the Foreign Office to inform the WarCabinet that, at the request of Baron Sonnino, the InterAllied Conference to discuss the position in the Balkanshas been postponed until July 18th. (intlld.) M.P.A.H.2, Whitehall Gardens, S,W. July 6th, 1917.
